Review.Titre: horrible Platform with rude, irresponsible, cynical customer service and dimwitted buyers
Review.Contenu: It is a horrible Platform with rude, irresponsible, cynical customer service and dimwitted buyers. I sold my GPU online using Jawa to this dumb customer who installed it into a low-profile machine, thus destroying my card. He then claimed that my card was broken and wanted a refund. He got what he wanted and returned my GPU in a disastrous state, as if it’s been ridden over by a car. The GPU was returned using a mailer bag! Not even a box. Jawa refused to compensate me in any way even though I had paid for the shipping materials and the cost of shipping and return. To avoid responsibilities, they even claim that if you do not buy the shipping labels from them, they don’t assist you with anything. Then how dare you charge us a fee for the sales? Clearly, Jawa is not interested in the welfare of the buyer and is only interested in sucking a significant percentage of your sales. They will side with the buyer, even if they are insolent fools who will destroy your GPU because they did not understand their computer compatibility with the card. Please don’t sell your precious GPU or computer parts here because the buyer will destroy them, and Jawa will side with them.

Review.Titre: This is just a local service
Review.Contenu: This is just a local service. Not obvious unless you go look for the terms of service document. Could have saved me a lot of wasted time if this was displayed on the site.Edit (since it is not possible to reply on TP): With local I mean restricted to a single nation. This is a deal breaker for most of the potential customers, and annoyingly there is no hint of this on the site.

Review.Titre: Jawa says I’m responsible!!
Review.Contenu: Sold my GPU using Jawa for the first time and used USPS with a photo of the package, receipt and tracking number. Apparently the seller never received it even tho usps says delivered. Jawa now says I am responsible and they will not give me my money that this card was sold for. I now have to file a claim with usps to try to get my money however it’s only insured for $100. Even tho I used Jawa as a service they refunded the customer no problem but won’t give me my money. I basically sent my gpu for free. Will never use Jawa again.

Review.Titre: I wish I could give zero stars
Review.Contenu: I wish I could give zero stars. Received a broken pc, customer support GHOSTED ME AND WONT ANSWER EMAILS. So I can't even get a refund. What am I supposed to do with a broke  pc that was $860?????

Review.Titre: Jawa is against you not for you when ever a problem arrises.
Review.Contenu: I created a account and listed a few dozen items, even applied to be a verified seller. Sold two things in three months. I never caused a single problem, never got a single warning or strike on my account. I even asked customer support for help with what I could do better with my business. Next thing I know I get a email today saying my account has been suspended and deleted because apparently there was a link to a phishing website on my business profile. I was extremely shocked by this. Why would I do or want that when I’m trying to grow a successful business? Well I asked jawa the same question but they didnt seem to care. I asked for proof of what there talking about but they just ignore my question. I plead that I had no knowledge or intentions of putting nefarious links on my business, but they didn’t care. In fact it seems to more you talk to them the worse it gets for you somehow. A hour latter they claim to find even more evidence “suddenly” when they “randomly” audit  my account. They said they reverse image searched my item pictures and found them on the internet. WOW amazing discovery Jawa it’s like I don’t have my same items with the same pictures listed on Facebook and eBay to sell, absolutely crazy. Next Jawa customer service further looking for evidence proving their case, says I have another variation of my account and how I don’t have original photos of high priced items. I tell them I only ever had my one account and that if they have any doubt I have legit ownership of my items I am happy to send them photos and receipts of everything immediately, but no they just ignore anything I say. Have I displayed any ill intent toward buyers or the community? Not at all. They wouldn’t work with me all, “I’ll go on a temporary account probation till I earn your trust back after several months” Nope they simply do not care and are not interested. Every time you answer a question from them they ask two more in it’s place painting the user as the enemy, all the while ignoring every question you have. I highly recommend caution when dealing with Jawa apparently they think they are the CIA and will scrub the internet to prove a view against you. Just posted this review and immediately got a response from Jawa about it, and you guessed it used my review it as further reason for there case against me. Apparently guilty until proven innocent is there motive. Just delete someones passion without so much as single word with them, apparently is the right way to go with them. Eventually I had enough of their 20 questions games, and refused to answer any more of there questions till they answered my questions. This was there response. “You can avoid answering all you want, until you answer the important questions you will not be allowed to sell on the platform.” You would think ohh this sounds like if you keep answering question from them you will get your account back, WRONG. I answer even more questions from them about my identity, I’m not afraid of them I have nothing to hide. I’m willing to send them my full ID, pictures of me with my items, what ever they want, just give me my account that I spent countless hours building. I don’t even care anymore about selling on jawa I just want to see my account. I eventually ask “will I get account back since I answered so many of your questions”, there response “[no you] will not be able to give you your account back for the aforementioned reasons“ I asked them why they even asked all these questions from me from the start when it obvious they never had intention to help or restore my account. No answer from them of course. I can only guess to waste my time or milk more data from me to do god knows with. In the end they’ll waste hours of your time playing 20 questions games to build a case against you without the remote intention of helping you out or being understanding. “Your not building a case for self” - Jawa Ryan Boyette Customer Service ManagerHello Amanda, I am more than forthcoming answering any questions related to my account and identity. I have absolutely nothing to hide and willing to do anything you ask. I have answered dozens and dozens of questions. Nothing happens, my accounts remains suspended with no proof of evidence when I ask for it. 1. More than willing to provide invoices and pictures of items you say I don’t  legitimately own. 2. More than willing to provide to a DD214 or copy of ID to prove identification. 3. I immediately asked for proof and removal of this link “found in multiple places” on my account as soon as I was told about it, yet provided 0 evidence of this being true.

Review.Titre: Site is often down
9% fee is lame
Poor customer service.
Review.Contenu: I did not recieve my quote in a timely manner and even then only after contacting customer service on multiple occasions. I finally skipped the main site and contacted an individual seller myself to get my needs met. I also dis not get a refund of the 5 dollars for my quote.

Review.Titre: Needs work on offer up. Would love to see auctions on used items. Stand by sellers on used items.
Review.Contenu: Jawa is a great buying website with no surprises. Selling online with jawa is hit and miss with buyers. They're uniformed and screwy with decisions after purchases they bought off my site. With no warranty or guarantees with purchase. Buyers still try to fix, break or want refund of things without returning items. Jawa has improved warranty Windows on buyers sales time to buyers. I can't recommend to accept return window as you could get a random buyer looking to poach your rep. After 30-60 ownership time. Good luck like all sales sites. Offer help. Don't add extra services without vetting buyer.

Review.Titre: The items listed are smaller than ebay
great gpu for a greater price
Review.Contenu: gpu works perfectly fine, mounting metal plate was slightly bent but was an easy fix. Male pin in female pcie port was bent as well and needed adjusting to connect the pcie cable which was scary, but it works and other than that and maybe some better shipping/packaging,

Review.Titre: Everything from the start to finish is…
Review.Contenu: Everything from the start to finish is smooth and quick. I only would wish the grace period is extended as 2 days feel a bit tight.

Review.Titre: Jawa's buyer focus and needless pestering
Review.Contenu: Jawa has a tremendous community of reliable buyers and sellers that communicate well and have integrity. Jawa itself needs a little work. they pester sellers needlessly, the fees are creeping up ever closer to ebay every day seemingly, and they are VERY buyer centric which worries me for the day I do find a dishonest buyer here.Over all though, so far, I am generally happy as a seller on Jawa and will continue to list items until I have an issue.

Review.Titre: Seller’s/ buyers
Review.Contenu: Varies from seller given my experience. A good seller would simply inform you about stuff and not constantly message you. Same can be said about selling on the platform. A good buyer would simply ask questions not constantly message you about money.

Review.Titre: The Truth About Jawa
Review.Contenu: Here's an authentic review for Jawa as a selling & buying platform. Its a great way to sell your PC parts and other peripherals as well to buy/flip. A lot of people are helpful in the discord server that I advise you to join. Here's my main issue with Jawa. Jawa does its best to hear from both sides when there is a dispute about an item but in doing so, it was pointed out by someone else that the platform is buyer centric. As a seller, this worries me. On their support page, it states, "You have 48 hours from time item was reported as delivered to inspect and test your purchase" for the buyer. If a dispute is opened after 48 hours, the money can still be pulled from the Stripe account once the seller has received an email about getting paid from Jawa. This concerns me because its showing that even after 48 hours, you're not guaranteed your money. If I could give this 4.5 stars I would because that seems fair in my opinion. Other than that, I do hope Jawa does implement some sort of change to their dispute system. Do not let what I say interfere with your decision upon selling your items on the platform. Seller fees are somewhat higher than I would like them to be but there's a good reason for that. I will continue to use Jawa because I love the platform and the people in the server are great!

Review.Titre: High shipping costs
Review.Contenu: Shipping prices are abnormally high. $20 to ship a CPU worth $80 or $25 to ship a single memory module that's on sale for $25 makes the site not worth using.Edit: USPS is now an option for shipping which does offer a much more reasonable rate.

Review.Titre: The person I worked was…great experience!
Review.Contenu: The person I worked was knowledgeable,professional, and had excellent service. I highly recommend him.

Review.Titre: Good selling place
Review.Contenu: Good selling place, They dont take as much like ebay. But support could be better

Review.Titre: Great communication
Review.Contenu: Great communication, fast shipping.

Review.Titre: Very nice sellers.
The seller was an absolute beast
Review.Contenu: The seller was an absolute beast! Helped me with every step of the ordering process. The item is even more beautiful than advertised, so happy I made this wonderful purchase of a lifetime

Review.Titre: My #1 Favorite Platform to Sell On
Review.Contenu: I've been buying & selling on Jawa for a little over 2 years now and have over 100 sales on my account. The Discord community is full of incredible people and staff is more than willing to help you with any orders you may have. I always list my things on Jawa FIRST because I'd rather sell to the awesome community who deserve it than on other marketplaces filled with people who'll waste my time.

Review.Titre: Something that made the experience…
Review.Contenu: Something that made the experience great was that the package arrived on time! came double boxed. and the pc was as good as they said it was. would 100% buy from this site again. thank you Jawa!!

Review.Titre: Amazing Site for Sellers and Buyers
Review.Contenu: As a seller, the platform is very easy to manage and to list items. The categories to list any item is very helpful to sellers. As a buyer as well, it's very easy to find PC parts or premade PCs. They have amazing staff as well as buyer and seller protection to secure both parties aren't being scammed.

Review.Titre: Jawa makes shopping for new and used PC…
Review.Contenu: Jawa makes shopping for new and used PC parts easy! The communication between seller, customer, and Jawa are what make the experience so pleasant. Any issues with your order will be immediately resolved and if a product is faulty, or not as advertised (although I’ve never had this issue) Jawa takes responsibility! I hope they stick around and continue to grow as the trust worthy reputable company that they are.

Review.Titre: Great first experience!
Review.Contenu: I'm so glad that a site like this exists. This was my first time buying anything from Jawa and I will be back again! Everything went perfectly, and the experience was a breeze!

Review.Titre: Seamless Selling Experience on Jawa.gg!
Review.Contenu: I recently had the pleasure of selling my 16GB Samsung 2x8GB DDR4 3200 MHz Laptop SODIMM Memory RAM on Jawa.gg, and I must say it was an outstanding experience from start to finish.The platform itself, Jawa.gg, provided a user-friendly interface that made listing my item a breeze. The straightforward process allowed me to showcase my product with clear details and images, ensuring potential buyers had all the information they needed.What impressed me the most was the responsiveness of the platform and the ease with which I could communicate with potential buyers. The messaging system on Jawa.gg facilitated quick and efficient communication, enabling me to promptly address inquiries and provide additional details about the RAM modules.The listing page for my item was well-organized and visually appealing, making it stand out among other products. The platform's search and filtering options also made it easy for interested buyers to find and explore my listing. This, coupled with Jawa.gg's active user base, significantly increased the visibility of my product.The transaction process was seamless and secure. Jawa.gg's payment system worked flawlessly, ensuring a smooth and worry-free transaction for both parties. I appreciated the transparency throughout the process, from the initial listing to the final sale.Furthermore, the buyer I interacted with was respectful and genuine. The community on Jawa.gg seems to attract trustworthy individuals who are serious about their transactions, fostering a positive environment for both buyers and sellers.Overall, my experience selling on Jawa.gg was incredibly positive. The platform's user-friendly design, effective communication tools, and secure transaction process make it a top choice for anyone looking to buy or sell tech-related items. I highly recommend Jawa.gg to others in the tech community and look forward to future transactions on this fantastic platform!

Review.Titre: Hooray for Jawa Customer Service! Dell Laptop E5510
Review.Contenu: On 8/1/2023 I purchased an older Dell Laptop that didn't perform as indicated and filed a DISPUTE. Jawa LISTENED to my complaint and worked with me and the seller for a resolution. The dispute was settled and Jawa made sure I was satisfied with my claim. STUFF HAPPENS between posting, shipping and receiving an item satisfactorily. Jawa worked the "middle" and provided helpful, friendly and professional customer service! I wouldn't hesitate ordering from Jawa again. Thank you kindly for providing an exciting platform for both buyers and sellers!

Review.Titre: Great Overall Experience
Review.Contenu: The products arrived quickly and undamaged, the Jawa website experience was very good, and prices were good. A piece of thermal tape was missing from the nvme ssd heatsink I ordered, possibly because it was a refurb?Overall, the issue was not worth disputing, and Jawa was in no way at fault.I would recommend Jawa for anyone interested in PCs.

Review.Titre: Legitimately great website and easy to…
Review.Contenu: Legitimately great website and easy to use, it’s nice to see a website full of pc enthusiasts like myself. Prices are fair and pretty much devoid of opportunists and scalpers!

Review.Titre: I Love Gaming Workstations…I wish I had more money buy more from them.
Review.Contenu: Because the seller Gaming Workstations lived up to all the positive reviews that other people gave them. Also that Jawa was willing to re-imburse my purchase if something went wrong. But the Gaming Workstations owner was above and beyond helpful. Even AFTER I got my new PC which was best price for a prebuilt I saw online. He he/she helped all my concerns and questions. Quite possiby one of the best buying experiences I ever had in 50+ yrs on this planet.

Review.Titre: Been a Verified Seller for almost 2 years now...
Review.Contenu: I would say it's been a journey selling through Jawa and spending thousands of dollars on Jawa. I have supported this team and their vision and they have such great people. Some sellers are hit and miss with quality, however, the staff does a good job improving the website as fast as possible. My account has become a top 5 selling account, and I don't see our business leaving Jawa anytime soon.

Review.Titre: Absolutely thrilled!
Review.Contenu: Had never heard of jawa before, but I ordered a new gaming PC, and am absolutely in love with what a great machine it is, and what a great price I got it for. Highly recommended. Thanks!

Review.Titre: Jawa is THE BEST!
Review.Contenu: I've been a buyer & a seller on this platform for about a year now.  The experience has been nothing but top notch.  The Jawa team is always implementing more ways to improve the platform, which will make it become even better than it already is.  I've bought & sold on other platforms in the past, but am glad I discovered Jawa.  I highly recommend Jawa for anyone looking to buy or sell PC & gaming products!

Review.Titre: Good prices and safe transactions
Review.Contenu: I'm a Jawa seller (and buyer) and you can find some good prices on Jawa of just about any computer or component. As a buyer, you are protected as your money is not released to the seller until two days after you receive your item. This gives you time to make sure the item arrived as described. If not, just send the item back and get your money back!

Review.Titre: I love this website.
Review.Contenu: I love this website and I've gotten great deals. I love looking at these deals and making partpicker lists out of them.

Review.Titre: Great marketplace for buyers $ sellers
Review.Contenu: Great marketplace for both buyers and sellers. Does what fb marketplace and/or other apps do but with a focus on pc gaming community which is really cool. I have experience as both a buyer and seller on here and the fees are as low as I’ve ever seen. Great security/fraud protocol in place to prevent scamming, using PayPal’s tools as well as holding funds until buyer marks item is received. First spot I recommend for someone looking to buy pc parts from reliable third parties. -Max M.

Review.Titre: The site was full of great seller and…
Review.Contenu: The site was full of great seller and the people who were "Jawa Certified" did a great job helping out me as a customer. One thing i would like to have been done is for us to be able to filter through the Prebuilts for certain parts that we would like in a build. And it would also help if there was a estimated response time for us the consumer when we had asked a question to the seller.

Review.Titre: Quick refund
Review.Contenu: Item damaged in shipping but Jawa issued me a refund. It was a great build and I'm sad I wasn't able to use it. The return process was easy and quick and I got a full refund. 10/10 would try and buy again.

Review.Titre: Excellent!
Review.Contenu: Ease of use of the website, straight-forward ordering, everything about the transaction from adding to my cart to the package arriving at my doorstep was a breeze. I am definitely going to order again and may try selling my used hardware some day.

Review.Titre: Jawa was impressive!
Review.Contenu: I discovered Jawa recently after extensive online research to find a computer to replace my existing one.My first experience with Jawa's quick responsiveness and help, as well as that of the seller too, has impressed me and made me a Jawa fan.Although I don't see a lot of purchases in the near future, I will spread the word about Jawa to friends and family about their excellent marketplace business model.

Review.Titre: Way easier to use than I first thought
Review.Contenu: Way easier to use than I first thought, although every seller is not interested in accepting offers so that's a small issue.Otherwise, I'm happy to use the site.  I've made 4 purchases now, and they've all been good.

Review.Titre: Straight forward process making my life easy!
Review.Contenu: It was easy to search, and message the seller to ask questions. The process being laid out and knowing what to expect in terms of next steps was fantastic. I've been recommending jawa to friends ever since.

Review.Titre: The products are nice and the prices are great
Review.Contenu: I recently ran into a dilemma with a comparison on products. I sent an email asking if they could clarify they were able to give me an answer and said that they would talk to the person to let them be more clear on the computer I was trying to build. And recently I bought some keyboards for my nephew School. I didn't expect them to be that good but I was delightfully surprised that they turned out great and my nephew is enjoying them they also felt like new. And the prices are great let's be honest you can buy a 4070 TI pre-built computer for 1850 from a verified vendor that's just great honestly.

Review.Titre: Forget eBay or Amazon for PC products…
Review.Contenu: If you are a gamer, enthusiast, or just like to tinker with computer parts… YOU NEED TO SHOP @ RGB Swap.  A hidden gem of a site that puts you in touch with sellers and great products at great market prices. I live in Toronto, Canada and despite shipping and duties, product arrived quickly, safely and still at a price point highly competitive to similar products in my local market. I will definitely continue shopping here at RGB Swap.  The sales process is legit and allows you to buy confidently knowing that there is a level of protection with what you are purchasing. A++++

Review.Titre: Good, Quick, Streamlined Buying and Selling Experience.
Review.Contenu: RGB Swap is owned by some pretty good people. I, like many others, hoard technology. Now I don't need to use shifty off-the-wall Ebay alternatives or try to buy a 3090 in a dark alley. I can feed my crippling addiction to hoarding PC parts from the comfort of my own home. Now next time somebody asks me how I've accumulated enough RAM sticks to fill a 10 gallon bucket, I can point them to RGB Swap, a safe, secure place to buy, sell, and trade PC parts, where they'll know that I got a damn good deal on them.

Review.Titre: Getting the card I wanted in 2017 for the same price as a 1050Ti today
Review.Contenu: There's nothing like finding exactly what you want. Delivery is scheduled today, that's pretty sweet. But getting a Strix 1070Ti for an older PC I've held onto is kind of priceless. My happiness with JAWA, and the part/price selection is pretty high.

Review.Titre: Excellent Alternative to that other…
Review.Contenu: Excellent Alternative to that other Auction site. Geared and focused to Computing needs without the senseless related to offerings. Just search for item you are interested in and if an RGB Swap seller has a listing you will see one if not then there is not one being sold in the RGB community. Overall the most pleasant buying experience when it comes to buying online.

Review.Titre: Jawa has really good deals and it was…
Review.Contenu: Jawa has really good deals and it was my first Time using it to buy parts and everything went well and I would recommend it to anybody looking for cheap parts.

Review.Titre: Great marketplace
Review.Contenu: It was easy to talk to sellers about any questions or concerns you have. There is also a Discord you can join with helpful channels for browsing listings and price drops in real time, and you communicate with some sellers directly there or with other people with technical expertise as well.

Review.Titre: The proof is in the pudding.
Review.Contenu: The proof is in the pudding.I’ve had all kinds of issues on eBay and other platforms such as; disputes taking forever, payments not going through, faulty listings, account suspensions for no apparent reasons, etc. I’ve yet to encounter a single issue buying, selling, or customer service wise with RGBswap. Can’t thank them enough for all that they do!

Review.Titre: Excellent customer service and smooth transaction
Review.Contenu: When I had issues creating an account, the owner, Nick, immediately answered the chat request I sent on the site's homepage. He helped me register, and I was able to purchase an item from a vendor on the site using Paypal. I received the item quickly, with no hassles at all. I plan to search for good deals on rgbswap regularly, especially since the site's anti-fraud protocols arguably are better than eBay's (e.g., the seller's funds aren't disbursed until the buyer verifies that the item has been received in the advertised condition).

Review.Titre: no scamming and fast shipping
RGB Swap is a GREAT marketplace for…
Review.Contenu: RGB Swap is a GREAT marketplace for tech-related gear, new or used. It's obviously growing a base of both sellers and buyers, products and popularity. And justifiably so--the site is fairly, diligently and proactively managed in all aspects. Check it out yourself!

Review.Titre: Jawa is Pogwa
Review.Contenu: Jawa has cool sellers i guess, Everything ive gotten has been good and sellers have been extra nice. But you know i feel like its missing something, they should add a store that sells gummies n other sweets. Otherwise really cool store i guess.

Review.Titre: Great customer service from the store I…
Review.Contenu: Great customer service from the store I bought from, and I found what I wanted right away!

Review.Titre: Great Experience
Review.Contenu: Attentive excellent staff who were there every step of the way, even when I messed up the shipping process.  An amazing and easy to use alternative to Ebay without the stress of worrying about scammers.  Extremely happy I was sent here by LTT and Graphically Challenged youtube channels.

Review.Titre: RGB Swap worked great for me and Nick was very helpful!
Review.Contenu: Like many other sites, RGBSwap will rely on its sellers/vendors. However, my purchase went extremely well. The seller shipped quickly and I received working components in great condition. Nick at RGBSwap had great communication and made sure that I was comfortable with the process. My payment wasn't released until I approved of what I had received, which was a great service. I am always checking RGBSwap for future electronic purchases. Thank you!

Review.Titre: The look on my daughter's face...
Review.Contenu: The look on my daughter's face was priceless 😻 she's 17 but she looked like an 8 year old at Christmas ❤️ after she set everything up the way she wanted...it looks beautiful 🤩 Thank you so much for the security of the product as well...

Review.Titre: Great Platform to sell PC gear and buy custom PC's
Review.Contenu: I have been selling on Jawa for a little over a year now. I have sold a few PC's and competition is very tight but still doable. The platform has improved a lot since I first came on board and the staff seem to have a good head on their shoulders and are quite fair. I personally haven't had any issues with sales or purchases on the platform. The big plus is that they integrated Affirm to their platform allowing more people that don't have the cash up front to be able to make payments which is a huge plus.

Review.Titre: RGBSwap is a great marketplace!
Review.Contenu: RGBSwap has been great to sell on! Even if there was a hiccup the owner is super responsive and fast to fix.He is even open to any suggestions that would make the site better for buyers and sellers. I am definitely always listing on here first. It also helps that transaction fees are relatively low compared to other sites.

Review.Titre: Hands down the best platform for gamers
Review.Contenu: I've been both a buyer and seller on Jawa.gg for several months now, and I have had **nothing but positive experiences.** Firstly, the deals there are some of the the best online. Secondly, the community there is amazing. Last & certainly not least, the customer support from both the sellers and Jawa itself is superb! **10/10 you need to check them out!**- Ryan, Forge Computers

Review.Titre: I love this website and they truly…
Review.Contenu: I love this website and they truly protect the gamer, miner, or Computer enthusiast more than any other site. Both parties have to be 100% satisfied for any money to be released. I’m so glad I found out about this through YouTube advertisement on mining channels!

Review.Titre: The Jawa community redefines what an…
Review.Contenu: The Jawa community redefines what an online marketplace can be. With caring and committed staff & volunteers and a great community of buyers and sellers, listing parts or buying builds from Jawa is a breeze.

Review.Titre: It really took into account how I was…
Review.Contenu: It really took into account how I was on a low budget and they gave me offers that was perfect. Would 100% buy from this company again. Also would recommend using it if you need a custom pc build as well.

Review.Titre: Excellent service
Review.Contenu: I have had nothing but great experiences using jawa to buy and sell parts. The staff goes above and beyond to make sure everything runs the way it’s supposed to and the customer support is some of the best I’ve ever seen.

Review.Titre: First time buyer
Review.Contenu: This was my first time buying, I would definitely buy again,The shipping calculator should be checked, it rarely works. A faster refund process would be awesome, international shipping, and a revamped UI

Review.Titre: Jawa is GOATED
Review.Contenu: I have shopped for numerous of PC parts on Jawa, not only for myself, but for my family and flips. Jawa has some of the best deals you'll find in the PC building market with even better sellers who are very helpful when it comes to anything. I can highly recommend Jawa.gg to gamers and people alike who are looking for great deals on quality products.

Review.Titre: Jawa Is legit and getting better and better
Review.Contenu: I found out about jawa by youtuber Bitwit  and I glad I listen to him.. Jawa is a great website for buying or selling Gaming PC, computer parts and more. Great Costumer service ( Ryan) and secure transactions.

Review.Titre: RGBSwap Is Off To A Good Start
Review.Contenu: I was a little hesitant to use RGBSwap since it’s still relatively new to me. But I had no issues with my order. Everything arrived exactly as it should have. Easy process. I wouldn’t mind seeing extra security features (like 2FA) added in the future. And the site had a small bug where it didn’t recognize that I had already read a chat msg from the vendor. So anytime I clicked a new page (on mobile), it would superimpose the chat on top of my desired page. Fixed this by manually entering my inbox and opening the chat. Everything functioned fine after that.

Review.Titre: This feels more of a community than a…
Review.Contenu: This feels more of a community than a marketplace. Everyone’s reasonable and understanding with pricing and negotiation. We’re all pc enthusiasts on a budget. And we help where we can.

Review.Titre: Great support
Review.Contenu: The site provided timely updates between the buyer and I and helped to ensure a smooth transaction for us as this was my first time shipping internationally! Heard about this site from YouTube several months ago and decided to give it a shot. Couldn't be more happier.

Review.Titre: Good prices!
Review.Contenu: Good prices, reliable sellers. I would like a bigger selection of parts, but I am sure that will come as the site grows.

Review.Titre: This is what I've been looking for
Review.Contenu: This is what I've been looking for, for a very long time. If you are tired of the headaches and complications of ebay, RGB Swap is the alternative you need. This site focuses on electronics and caters to the PC Builders and enthusiasts. My purchase experience was stress free. It was simple and seamless. The protection that is provided by the owner of this site is safe and comprehensive and you can rest assured that any discrepancies and disputes will be closely monitored and promptly addressed. There is true Real Time support!The site does need a few touch ups. For instance it will be such a great help if the date an item is first posted is displayed, as well as how long an item has been up for sale. Other than that, this site is bookmarked on my phone and personal computer.

Review.Titre: Ebay is dead to me now.. RGB SWAP!
Review.Contenu: Staff and customer support is fantastic! They reached out to even get confirmation on my address due to it being a bit different because I have a APO. The shipping is also much lower than expected for my address as well. I love this site so much! Cant recommend it enough. Nothing but a great experience as a buyer.

Review.Titre: Great platform and website!
Review.Contenu: Great website that made for a quick and easy purchase. Everyone was extremely helpful and responsive. There is peace of mind here having actual support vs. ebay with having to wait weeks for a reply. Will absolutely buy again from RGB swap.

Review.Titre: I sold a water cooled 3080 ti
Review.Contenu: I purchased a 3080 ti. Unfortunately tha manufacturer took so long shipping the product to me that I had to go in a different direction, so I needed to sell the card. RGB Swap made it easy for me to advertise the card . There was a problem with my ad. The site owner helped me correct it. A buyer found my ad, we conversed and reached a deal. I didn't make any money but the buyer got the card he wanted (new in the box) and I wasn't stuck with an expensive video card I couldn't use. I fully recommend RGB Swap!

Review.Titre: I found great parts for a great deal!
Review.Contenu: Was a really painless experience. Saw parts I wanted, placed my order, and put in my payment info. Love the guaranteed working return policy also!

Review.Titre: I was skeptical.
Review.Contenu: I was skeptical.. I'm happy to be wrong! You just don't know what you're getting with a new marketplace like RGB Swap but the purchase process was easy, the chat feature is genius, the choice of shipping methods is a game changer. (Anytime I can choose not to have a seller use FedEx, I will) I had 1 simple issue with the checkout process and the owner himself emailed me directly the following day for feedback. How can you beat that kind of service? Of course that won't be possible once the site grows but I was floored to see his email in my inbox. You can shop with RGB Swap with confidence. I will again for sure.

Review.Titre: Excellant service!
Review.Contenu: My business with Jawa so far has been amazing!  Almost everything I've ordered has arrived quickly and in good working order.  The sole exception so far was not even the fault of the seller.  I hope to do more shopping through Jawa for years to come!

Review.Titre: Customer Service
Review.Contenu: Excellent customer service for me, as a new user of the sight. My GPU buying experience was seamless and a great deal! Many options to chat with either the seller or website support. The buyer protection plan was very comforting, as I placed my trust in this new platform and was not disappointed!

Review.Titre: VERY easy & FAIR site to do business…
Review.Contenu: VERY easy & FAIR site to do business with.  I shop for various PC components and have made VERY good deals. They have not disappointed me in several purchases. My thanks

Review.Titre: Great place to buy used computer parts.
Review.Contenu: I had a great experience buying a used graphics card on Jawa. The seller was quick to respond to my order, and the card came in perfect condition, and for a low price.

Review.Titre: GREAT MAN LET ME TELL YALL MY PC CAME…
Review.Contenu: GREAT MAN LET ME TELL YALL MY PC CAME ONE DAY LATER FOR ONLY $25 THATS LIKE SOME ONE TO ONE AMAZON NEXT DAY SHIPPING AND THEN WHEN I RECIEVED THE PC IF WAS PACKAGED PERFECTLY THE SELLER ALSO VERY NICE AND COMMUNCATIVE ANSWERED QUESTIONS I HAD THIS WAS SOME A+ TYPE SERVICE

Review.Titre: I came here and gave RGB Swap a chance…
Review.Contenu: I came here and gave RGB Swap a chance because I'm sick of the scamming and High seller rates and poor customer service with eBay.When I had some questions it wasn't difficult to get ahold of the staff. Its obvious they care about my concurs and not just placating me.The fair selling rates made it so I could charge less.I cant wait for the masses to convert!

Review.Titre: Up and Coming and Easily a Great Competitor to Ebay
Review.Contenu: As a merchant, I cannot be more satisfied with this up and coming marketplace. It has been a breeze to set up my account and post any and all electronics and computer gear. Anytime I have had a question or been confused, the FAQ center is a great resource, but even then, the leadership of the website is easily reachable by email and they respond within the same day.  The fees are minimal and I feel very much in control for how I want to make my sell posts. The leadership of the website even source the merchants for feedback on how to advance the website and make it better for all. It has been a wonderful and fantastic experience so far and I look forward to what is in store for the future.

Review.Titre: This site is looking good.
Review.Contenu: The site is well laid out and easy to navigate.It's easy to find what you're looking for and I think as time goes on the selection will improve. They have a good bit now and look forward to their growth.It looks like they have your back on purchases, though I have only bought one thing (a GPU) and that went well with no issues.I like that you can sell your hardware directly to them, though I always give my old stuff away. It's a nice feature though.

Review.Titre: A great early-stage paltform!
Review.Contenu: A solid platform. The dev is active and personally responsive. This is a great grass-roots movement to make buying and selling PC parts easier. I can't wait to see where it'll grow and develop!

Review.Titre: I got a great computer from JBT…
Review.Contenu: I got a great computer from JBT Computers. Had been looking for one like I got for all if 2022. Price something I could not pass up. Plus JBT answered all of my questions in a quick, professional manner. Could not ask for anything better.

Review.Titre: Excellent service!
Review.Contenu: I've made 4 purchases on rgbswap.com and every single time it was a great experience. I highly recommend the website, the people who run it are polite and professional and they go out of their way to give you the best experience possible.

Review.Titre: Excellent Experience!
Review.Contenu: Buying from RGB Swap is super easy. The site is nicely laid out and user-friendly and checking out is a breeze. I got a good deal on a new CPU you couldn't get anywhere else at the time of this review so I'm quite happy with the whole experience! =)

Review.Titre: Marketplace by real techies.
Review.Contenu: I love how this is a marketplace for computer parts by people that love tech not a bunch of soulless resellers trying to make a buck off of people.

Review.Titre: Easy to order and package was shipped…
Review.Contenu: Easy to order and package was shipped quickly and packaged well.

Review.Titre: Best site for PC and Pc parts
Review.Contenu: amazing site filled with people who care about the products they sell, communication between buyer and seller is super amazing.

Review.Titre: Good service, good support
Review.Contenu: Jawa made it easy for me to find a good deal on an open-box GPU to use in a friend's new system. Their policies work well for both sellers and buyers and I would 100% recommend and use Jawa again.

Review.Titre: Great Buy
Review.Contenu: Fast, easy and as expected. GPU was in great condition when it arrived and the seller was very helpful and communicated each detail.

Review.Titre: Customer servic was REAL service!
Review.Contenu: Customer servicwas actually service! So refreshing to have a site that works that way.  Great communication all around.

Review.Titre: Best website for buying/selling products
Review.Contenu: No fees, better value, there’s not much choices of products to choose from but I hope more will available in the future, also RGB Swap is the best website compared to other store/auction website that has too much fees

Review.Titre: Jawa is great!
Review.Contenu: I've been using Jawa for a while and I've loved the community, the website design, the ease-of-use, and the great prices that you can expect to see on jawa!

Review.Titre: fast shipping and always lets us kno
Review.Contenu: fast shipping and always lets us know when give away is happening and looking forward for more pc giveaways

Review.Titre: Good for people on a budget or for flipping
Review.Contenu: This website is solely ment for people to resell pc stuff. And is better than ebay because you only find pc parts or other things related to it. And not something that is not related to the thing you want to find.

Review.Titre: Numero uno website
Review.Contenu: Jawa.gg is an amazing site that you can buy and sell PC stuff online. Shipping, to the product I receive from sellers or a sale, it's a super good website. Service is also a number 1.

Review.Titre: service and attentiveness in a class of…
Review.Contenu: service and attentiveness in a class of its own. never had a smoother and easier transaction or better interaction with customer service. Nick runs a hell of a thing here. loyal customer earned

Review.Titre: Allowed me to purchase a product I’ve…
Review.Contenu: Allowed me to purchase a product I’ve wanted for a long time with a chance to test it and make sure it worked. The two day evaluation is what sold me. I knew I could test my card to make sure it was functioning properly. This is a great website. Everything went smoothly with my transaction.

Review.Titre: amazing purchase
Review.Contenu: The item arrived quicker than I could've imagined and it perfect shape!

Review.Titre: Was easy to use for buying a new PC
Review.Contenu: Was easy to use for buying a new PC. Ran into some early hiccups and both the seller and customer support teams handled it without issue. Would buy from again.

Review.Titre: Awesome new site
Review.Contenu: I can't remember where I saw this site mentioned but I thought I would try it since I needed a graphics card for my first build. I had put a bid in on a Geforce rtx 1650 card and won the bid. Something happened that I wasn't able to go in a pay for it so Nick said he would find out was happened. He got back to me and said that there wasn't a safeguard on the amount of people to win the bidding and 4 people won the bid and there were only 3 cards available. He was able to find me another that was in my budget so I am now able to get my build completed.Thanks to Nick, this old geek can build her first gaming computer!Thanks again Nick!

Review.Titre: Good service
Review.Contenu: Good service, build with alot of good people who are trustworthy and kind from my experience. I'd definitely recommend Jawa.

Review.Titre: Support is quick to respond and sellers…
Review.Contenu: Support is quick to respond and sellers are always positive!

Review.Titre: First but not last Jawa purchase
Review.Contenu: The experience with the sellers and Jawa team was great. They all were very responsive and helpful along the way. I would recommend jawa to anyone.

Review.Titre: Bought 2 drives
Review.Contenu: I bought 2 different drives from 2 different vendors and everything was smooth sailing. Had a problem with 1 drive, but vendor replaced it very quickly.

Review.Titre: Great place to by and sell computer…
Review.Contenu: Great place to by and sell computer specific products and game systems. Great prices and much easier to navigate than that place that starts with and E and ends with a bay.

Review.Titre: Fast and friendly customer service
Review.Contenu: Fast and friendly customer service. Products are shipped with on point tracking and security. Product listing is detailed and fairly priced.

Review.Titre: Delighted to find out a platform like…
Review.Contenu: Delighted to find out a platform like this exists. Very convenient and helpful in finding reputable sellers. Good customer service.

Review.Titre: I support reusing older equipment
Review.Contenu: I support reusing older equipment.  Jawa is providing a great platform for doing that.  I get to upgrade my older PC and it keeps e-cycle stuff out of a landfill.  Win/Win in my book.

Review.Titre: The ease of getting quality builds.
Review.Contenu: The ease of getting quality built gaming PCs at a good price. way better then buying a OEM pc.

Review.Titre: I love this site
Review.Contenu: I love this site.  If you’re a gamer or pc builder you should visit often.  Great deals on pc components.  Plus it’s very easy.

Review.Titre: I was a little skeptical at first
Review.Contenu: I was a little skeptical at first, but this site did not disappoint. Everything from searching and purchasing items on this website felt smooth and easy on the eyes. 5 stars 😗

Review.Titre: Prices and product selection!!!
Review.Contenu: Prices and product selection!!!! Just knowing that things are guaranteed to work makes the decision effortless.

Review.Titre: Website is well laid out and easy to…
Review.Contenu: Website is well laid out and easy to browse. The ordering process was easy and secure; with the merchandise arriving in a timely manner.
